column2: University of the West of Scotland
column5: Contemporary businesses need managers who relish and adapt to the ever-changing complex challenges that shape today’s globalised marketplace.Designed to build your international management career, the MSc in International Management will equip you with the theoretical knowledge and conceptual skills to work in environments requiring high levels of international managerial competence.You will gain a thorough grounding in the essential knowledge and skills for a management career in business and industry. Particular emphasis is on strategy, creativity, leadership and internationalisation within the context of rapidly changing external environments.
column9: 1-2 years full time, 3 years part time
